items.name: case notAvailableInStorefront
items.desc: The function isn’t available on devices configured for this storefront.

items.name: case notEntitled
items.desc: The app doesn’t have the appropriate entitlements to use the functionality.

items.name: var localizedDescription: String
items.desc: A string containing the localized description of the error.

items.name: var errorDescription: String?
items.desc: A description of the error, suitable for debugging.

items.name: var failureReason: String?
items.desc: A message describing the reason for the failure.

items.name: var helpAnchor: String?
items.desc: A localized message that provides additional information if the user requests help.

items.name: var recoverySuggestion: String?
items.desc: A message containing a suggestion for recovering from the error.
